Detailed Description

Cipher that implements AES GCM mode encryption / decryption.

The AES GCM Authentication Tag will be appended as the last 16 bytes of the ciphertext.

Property Documentation

◆ AuthDataBytes

array< byte>^ IonicSecurity::SDK::AesGcmCipher::AuthDataBytes
getset

The AES GCM Additional Authenticated Data (AAD)

Parameters
[in]mpbyAddAuthDataBytesPointer to the Additional Authenticated Data (AAD) byte array. If empty, no AAD will be used.

Set the AES GCM Additional Authenticated Data (AAD). If any problem occurs an SdkException is thrown.

◆ CipherKeyLen

int IonicSecurity::SDK::AesGcmCipher::CipherKeyLen
staticget

The required length of the AES cipher key.

Returns
The required length of the AES cipher key. Providing a key of any other length will result in an error being returned during any encryption / decryption operation.

◆ KeyBytes

array< System:: Byte>^ IonicSecurity::SDK::AesGcmCipher::KeyBytes
getset

The AES cipher key.

Parameters
[in]mpbyCipherKeyThe key buffer. The key length should always be equal to AesGcmCipher::CipherKeyLen().

◆ KeyHex

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::AesGcmCipher::KeyHex
set

The AES cipher key from a hex encoded string.

Parameters
[in]mwsCipherKeyHexThe hex key string. The decoded key length should always be equal to AesGcmCipher::CipherKeyLen().
